Package de.schildbach.pte.util

Class XmlPullUtil

java.lang.Object
de.schildbach.pte.util.XmlPullUtil
public final class XmlPullUtil extends Object
Handy functions that combines XmlPull API into higher level functionality.

    • skipSubTree

      public static void skipSubTree(org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParser pp) throws org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException, IOException
      Skip sub tree that is currently parser positioned on.
      NOTE: parser must be on START_TAG and when function returns parser will be positioned on corresponding END_TAG
      Throws:
      org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException
      IOException
